title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.5 - Intermodal fares
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1003.5 - Intermodal fares

State Regulations

The authorities may offer for sale fares for travel both on
its facilities and the facilities of other operators at aggregate amounts which
comprise the fare of the applicable authority and the other operator's fare
pursuant to arrangement with such operator or with an appropriate public
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1003.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
